subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|口|一|ls=sc|c1=s|c2=s|t1=mouth}} something in the mouth, sweet

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-klum||sweet}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT). Cognate with {{cog|lus|thlum}}, {{cog|lep|tr=khlyam}}.

Possibly related to {{och-l|甜|sweet}} and {{och-l|柑|mandarin orange}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
